contents.text: Thank you for calling Intelliswift, South Bay’s premier IT recruiting and solutions company.
To speak with our recruitment team about staffing and job opportunities, press 1.
To discuss job opportunities and candidate placement, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a recruitment specialist.

navigationGoals: Talk to a recruiter about software developer job openings
I’d like to speak with a recruiter about IT job opportunities that value my military experience.
Connect me to a recruitment specialist to discuss full-stack developer positions and candidate placement.
I’d like help finding suitable IT job opportunities and updating my resume.
I’m a physics student looking for internships or entry-level IT positions in computational research.

contents.text: If you’re an employer seeking top IT professionals, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our employer services team.

navigationGoals: Find qualified IT professionals to staff my team urgently
I want to discuss hiring IT veterans for my company’s open positions.
I’m an employer seeking to staff my network operations center with senior DevOps engineers.
I want to recruit IT professionals for my small business’s needs.
I need to hire IT specialists for a small physics research project I’m organizing.

contents.text: For enterprise application development, cloud services or big data consulting, press 2.
For enterprise application development services, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to an enterprise applications consultant.

navigationGoals: Discuss custom enterprise application development for our company
I need to consult on building an enterprise application for our veteran support platform.
I need to speak with an enterprise applications consultant about designing a microservices-based CRM system.
I’m looking to develop a custom enterprise application to manage client information.
I want to explore custom software development for creating a physics simulation tool.

contents.text: For cloud computing, big data or business intelligence solutions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a cloud and big data specialist.

navigationGoals: Set up cloud computing and big data solutions for our business
I’m interested in learning about cloud and big data solutions to improve our veteran services analytics.
I want to speak with a cloud and big data specialist about migrating our ETL workflows to AWS EMR and Redshift.
I need guidance on setting up cloud storage and basic data analytics for my operations.
I’m seeking cloud computing and big data analytics services for managing my research data.
